short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces Jobvite's guilt-tripping dog with a smug designer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension changes the image and text of the Jobvite timeout page (https://source.jobvite.com/admin/info/timeout.html) so that it amuses you rather than makes you feel annoyed or guilty.

To read about why and how I did it, check out this blog post: http://eeblet.com/blog/?p=108.
